channel.title: Loading Coustom Fonts
channel.description: I want to load custom fonts into my client. Can someone post the code I can put into RSFont.java so I can load the .dat file from cache and can someone please tell me where I would need to but the new load("./biggerfont.dat");? thanks! :)
